ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Finding a guild
ygData.msgSnippet: this is so true. A LOT of the comraderie will come from having levelled up with guildmates. you ll spend a lot of time with them.  if you re in a guild that
ygData.messageBody:
this is so true.

A LOT of the comraderie will come from having levelled up with guildmates.
you'll spend a lot of time with them. if you're in a guild that has the
numbers and the good people but it's hard to get a group, you'll find
yourself in pickup groups and getting to know everyone but your guild it
seems.

-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
Sent: Monday, May 15, 2000 10:42 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Finding a guild


<snip>then you might be better off checking which guilds have
the most comparable level players on when your on, rather than which guilds
have the most members enrolled.
<snip>
